name: Tots Pink Leather Ballet Shoes (with pre-sewn elastic)
description:
Quality introductory leather ballet shoes,  full Suede Sole, classic ballet pink, with handy time saving pre- sewn elastic. 

Children's sizes only.

Our Size 10.5 ballet shoe, generally fits a UK childs outdoor size 9.

Other sizes are available - please email for details. Please include in messages your child's outdoor shoe size.

name: Tiny Tots Mini Tutu Skirts
description: HEART TUTU SKIRT (TOP SKIRT IN PICTURE) A gorgeous skirt, fit for a little princess. Tiny pink hearts dotted on sweet layers of nylon tulle. One size - Elasticated waist. 100% Nylon ROSE TUTU SKIRT (MIDDLE SKIRT IN PICTURE) A tiny, pretty, soft and light tutu skirt. 2 very fine layers of pink, soft nylon tulle for your mini ballerina. Little white rosebud details, dotted around skirt. One size - Elasticated waist. 100% Nylon RAINBOW TUTU SKIRT (2ND TO LAST SKIRT IN PICTURE) A lovely little nylon tulle tutu skirt, with a stiffer, rainbow fairy multi pastel-coloured top layer of net. 100% Nylon One size - Elasticated waist. RIBBON TUTU SKIRT (BOTTOM SKIRT IN PICTURE) A lovely floaty Tutu skirt on a pink satin ribbon. Tie together waist. 2 layers of ballet pink, soft nylon tulle with pretty ribbon and flower detailing. One size - Ribbon tie waist- into bow at the back. 100% Nylon Please select your skirt choice from the drop down menu below.

name: Tiny Tots Full Tutu Dress
description:
A gorgeous Capezio tutu dress.
The camisole leotard has full front bodice lining and a satin waistband with back bow detail above the attached soft tulle net skirt.

Very pretty and delighful with the skirt sprinkled in mini sparkling silver stars!

Bodice 90% Cotton 10% Lycra Spandex, Skirt 100% Polyester, Trim 90% Nylon 10% Spandex with hologram star sparkles.

The quality fabric is soft, long lasting and resist shrinkage and fading.
